title: Galactic Nightscape.
content:
# Galactic Nightscape

Welcome to Galactic Nightscape, a website dedicated to exploring the beauty of the night sky. Our website features stunning photographs of the Milky Way galaxy visible overhead, captured by talented photographers from around the world.

At Galactic Nightscape, we believe that the night sky is one of the most awe-inspiring sights in nature. Whether you're an amateur astronomer or simply someone who appreciates the beauty of the cosmos, our website is the perfect place to explore and discover the wonders of the universe.

Browse our collection of breathtaking images, learn about the science behind the stars, and connect with other stargazers from around the globe. Join us on a journey through the cosmos and experience the magic of the night sky for yourself.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A photograph of a starry night sky, with the Milky Way galaxy visible overhead."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
